title: Save Up To 76% On NordVPN And Get A Free Amazon Gift Card
description: For a limited time, NordVPN is offering up to 76% off on two-year subscription plans. As a bonus, select plans also include an up to $50 Amazon gift card if you keep your subscription for at least 31 days. The deal only applies to NordVPN's 2-year plans, which require you to pay in full at sign-up, and the discount and Amazon gift card amount change depending on which plan you buy. Here's a look at the options:NordVPN 2-Plan Deals See deal at NordVPN Basic -- $81.36 for the first 24 months (normally $278.16 per 24 months)Plus -- $105.36 for the first 24 months (normally $359.76 per 24 months) - Also includes $20 Amazon gift cardComplete -- $129.36 for the first 24 months (normally $439 per 24 months) - Also includes $40 Amazon gift cardPrime -- $177.36 for the first 24 months (normally $743.76 per 24 months) - Also includes $50 Amazon gift cardWhile all four 2-year NordVPN plans are discounted, only the Plus, Complete, and Prime plans include Amazon gift cards. Each plan includes differing features, which we've outlined below.Note that the discounted price only applies to the first 24-month purchase. After the promotional period, all subscriptions roll over to the full standard price unless you cancel ahead of time. NordVPN also offers a full 30-day money-back guarantee, so if you change your mind within the first month of service, you can cancel for a full refund. However, the Amazon gift card bonus is only delivered if you keep your 2-year Plus, Complete, or Prime plan for 31 days.Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: NordVPN is offering a huge discount deal on select 2-year plans, and is throwing in up to $50 Amazon gift cards as a bonus.

html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

For a limited time, NordVPN is offering up to 76% off on two-year subscription plans. As a bonus, select plans also include an up to $50 Amazon gift card if you keep your subscription for at least 31 days. The deal only applies to NordVPN's 2-year plans, which require you to pay in full at sign-up, and the discount and Amazon gift card amount change depending on which plan you buy. Here's a look at the options:

NordVPN 2-Plan Deals

  • Basic -- $81.36 for the first 24 months (normally $278.16 per 24 months)
  • Plus -- $105.36 for the first 24 months (normally $359.76 per 24 months) - Also includes $20 Amazon gift card
  • Complete -- $129.36 for the first 24 months (normally $439 per 24 months) - Also includes $40 Amazon gift card
  • Prime -- $177.36 for the first 24 months (normally $743.76 per 24 months) - Also includes $50 Amazon gift card

While all four 2-year NordVPN plans are discounted, only the Plus, Complete, and Prime plans include Amazon gift cards. Each plan includes differing features, which we've outlined below.

Note that the discounted price only applies to the first 24-month purchase. After the promotional period, all subscriptions roll over to the full standard price unless you cancel ahead of time. NordVPN also offers a full 30-day money-back guarantee, so if you change your mind within the first month of service, you can cancel for a full refund. However, the Amazon gift card bonus is only delivered if you keep your 2-year Plus, Complete, or Prime plan for 31 days.

It's worth mentioning that NordVPN also offers annual and monthly subscription options, although these plans aren't as steeply discounted and do not include the Amazon gift card freebie.

NordVPN plan features

All four NordVPN plans include different features and benefits, starting with simple VPN and DNS services for the Basic plan, and up to 1TB of cloud storage and bonus cybersecurity protections for the more expensive plans. Here's a look at everything included in each subscription plan. Note that these features are identical between the month, annual, and 24-month payment options.

Basic:

  • Access to NordVPN and DNS protection for up to 10 devices

Plus:

  • Access to NordVPN and DNS protection for up to 10 devices
  • Anti-malware protection
  • Advanced browsing protection
  • Ad and tracker blocker
  • Cross-platform password manager
  • Data breach scanner

Complete:

  • Access to NordVPN and DNS protection for up to 10 devices
  • Anti-malware protection
  • Advanced browsing protection
  • Ad and tracker blocker
  • Cross-platform password manager
  • Data breach scanner
  • 1 TB of encrypted cloud storage

Prime:

The Prime plan also includes all the aforementioned features from the other tiers, plus NordVPN's NordProtect cybersecurity suite, which offers the following services:

  • Dark Web Monitoring
  • 1-Bureau credit monitoring
  • VantageScore 3.0 credit score by TransUnion
  • Credit freeze assistance
  • Identity theft insurance ($1M in coverage)
  • Cyber extortion insurance ($100K in coverage)
